the hip-hop star says he's not interested in the job. "I won't work with Simon Cowell on X Factor or American Idol," he tells British newspaper The Mirror this week. Simon Cowell has a good ear, but his Idol and X Factor acts don't dominate the charts in the States. Hip-hop does.
